subject: Action required: You've been invited to join the Meta Agency Partner Program analytics.agency-partne...
description_text:
Xin chào,

 

   You're invited to join the Meta Agency Partner Program analytics.agency-partner-platform.com business portfolioMeta Agency Partner Program analytics.agency-partner-platform.com is not part of or affiliated with Meta. Only approve requests and invitations from people and businesses that you know and trust. Meta will never ask for passwords, payment information or personal details in an email.Meta Agency Support invited you to join the Meta Agency Partner Program analytics.agency-partner-platform.com business portfolio on Meta Business Suite. Depending on your access, you can do things such as help manage Pages, Instagram accounts, ad accounts and people's assignments.Portfolios connect a business's Facebook Pages and other business assets so that you can manage them all in one place.You may need to log in with your managed Meta account if it's required by your organisation.This invitation will expire on December 16, 2025. After this date, you won't be able to accept the invitation.View invitationGet started with business tools from MetaYou can access business tools, such as Meta Business Suite and Ads Manager to help you connect with your customers and get better business results.Our business tools can help you:Save timeAccess everything that you need to manage your business across Facebook, Instagram and Messenger all in one place.Connect with customersRead and reply to messages and comments from a single inbox.Get resultsTrack what's working best with performance insights across Meta technologies.About Meta Business Suite   

 

Trân trọng cảm ơn!
Đội ngũ Facebook



========================================
Thư này đã được gửi đến service@simsonn.com. Vui lòng nhấp vào liên kết bên dưới để hủy đăng ký nếu bạn không muốn nhận những email như thế này từ Meta trong tương lai.
